name: BugKiller (lyfe264)
description:
This game was made for GMC Jam 48 where the theme was "GLITCHES AND BUGS".

Your house is infested with bugs but you can't escape it until you validate your concert tickets on your computer.

To find them you will have to eliminate the bugs with your usual weapons.

This game could have been easy but it is totally buggy and your virtual debugger corrects errors with a significant delay time.

Can you survive all 4 levels?
